query: SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable, column_default FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'users' ORDER BY ordinal_position;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3DrEtHdFZh6aMXG.f61813878e5e --database CTvyHTDriMTH88WXuMkTqz --execute SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable, column_default FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'users' ORDER BY ordinal_position;
stdout:
column_name	data_type	is_nullable	column_default
id	int	NO	NULL
openId	varchar	NO	NULL
name	text	YES	NULL
email	varchar	YES	NULL
loginMethod	varchar	YES	NULL
role	enum	NO	user
createdAt	timestamp	NO	CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updatedAt	timestamp	NO	CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
lastSignedIn	timestamp	NO	CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
